I practically live in tank tops. I am always looking for unique styles and colors. The ForeFair Women's Sleeveless Sexy Backless Crop Top fit the bill. I am so glad that I got this tank. The fabric is double layered on both the front and back, so it is not at all transparent. The construction is very nice and the pleating in the front looks beautiful. I love the style. The fabric itself is soft and stretchy. It is so, so comfortable to wear. The fit is perfect. This shirt was made for me in the size small! For reference, I am 5'6" at 119 lbs. You will need an appropriate bra to wear under the tank, or if you're tiny like me, you can go braless because the fabric does have some support. The recommendation is to dry clean, but I washed the tank on a gentle cycle and line dried it. It came out perfectly. This is a really nice quality tank...great value. I highly recommend it if you love sexy tank tops.

Overall I do like this product. It's essentially just as pictured. It shows on the model that its small and tight and it fits that way too. I got the deepgray size medium. Generally medium is my size, sometimes even a small. I'm 5'6.5" and about 135 lbs. I was thinking with the medium maybe it would fit but not super tight but unfortunately it was still very snug. Came up on my torso further than I'd like but not terribly. Its thick. As if its multiple pieces of fabric. However I love the feel of the fabric and the thickness is nice. This feels like a nice quality and the top is cut with the rouching in a flattering way.

The material is nice and cool, very stretchy, almost like a slinky material, but it’s nothing at all. The color is a nice, dusty blue, which I like. The neckline is flattering, it is not too low-cut. I am 53 at 110 pounds I got size small, 32D cups, it fits perfectly.

This is a very cute top, stretchy, form fitting, soft material. For the record I am wearing a normal bra with it, the issue is not so much the straps showing in front but they do show in back. The material is pretty thin and shows some striping so be careful with washing and ironing

评论概述: Stunning, Flattering Fit! Luxurious Material! Beautiful Design!
评论详情: For reference, I’m an eccentric Goth that typically wears a teen size S or XS and a 32B bra, I’m 5’4, 115 pounds, and I have the Theatrical Romantic Kibbe body type. I ordered this top in a size XS in the color “Grayblue.” I was a teen in the Y2K era, and I’d say that this top does reflect what you would have found during that time. Even comparing it to some of the tops from then that I still have, it’s very similar.  I love the fit of this top, which clings to all my curves and offers just enough, slight chest compression to give my breasts a small boost when going braless. Luckily, I do have bras meant for this kind of top that won’t stick out anywhere and that produce significant cleavage that looks great with this top; however, most of my bras would not be compatible. If I pull this top all the way down, it sits just over the top of my hip bones, but since I’m significantly wider there than at my much smaller waist, the bottom of this top tends to rise, bunching up closer to my waist, which it defines nicely. This has a wide, sweetheart neckline that exposes a lot of the upper chest. Wide necklines look great on me, so I’m happy about that. If you don’t want the neckline to sit quite so low as it naturally does, then by pulling it up, you might have problems with the shoulder straps falling off, as they’re widely placed and fairly long. The square-cut backline is nice and low; even lower than the neckline. Its positioning aligns with the very bottom of my breasts, and it looks very sexy. Being so low, though, it does, once again, narrow the selection of bras that can be worn with this.  The material is double-layered, so this top isn’t see-thru. Also, the material is incredibly soft and is such a joy to touch and feel all over. It offers a slight amount of stretch and a slight amount of compression that might be able to cinch your waist a bit if you size down. The color I ordered matches that of the product images exactly, so I’m happy about that.  Overall, I’m in love with this absolutely sexy, comfortable, and flattering top!
Awesome basic tank for going out and layering, mater was super smooth. Double lined fabric that fit great. Color matched what was showed, comfortable

The quality of the fabric was really great. I liked how soft and stretchy it was. However, the cut and style of the front of the tank top is not flattering at all, and the simple stitched line down the front did make it look a little cheap.
